db:abstract.db:para: The QStyleOptionComboBox class is used to describe the parameter for drawing a combobox.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: QStyleOptionButton contains all the information that QStyle functions need to draw QComboBox.

For performance reasons, the access to the member variables is direct (i.e., using the . or -> operator). This low-level feel makes the structures straightforward to use and emphasizes that these are simply parameters used by the style functions.
For an example demonstrating how style options can be used, see the Styles example.

db:section.db:title: enum QStyleOptionComboBox::StyleOptionType
db:section.db:para: This enum is used to hold information about the type of the style option, and is defined for each QStyleOption subclass.

db:td.db:para: The type of style option provided (SO_ComboBox for this class).

db:section.db:para: The type is used internally by QStyleOption, its subclasses, and qstyleoption_cast() to determine the type of style option. In general you do not need to worry about this unless you want to create your own QStyleOption subclass and your own styles.

db:section.db:title: enum QStyleOptionComboBox::StyleOptionVersion
db:section.db:para: This enum is used to hold information about the version of the style option, and is defined for each QStyleOption subclass.
The version is used by QStyleOption subclasses to implement extensions without breaking compatibility. If you use qstyleoption_cast(), you normally do not need to check it.

db:section.db:title: QStyleOptionComboBox::QStyleOptionComboBox()
db:section.db:para: Creates a QStyleOptionComboBox, initializing the members variables to their default values.

db:section.db:title: QStyleOptionComboBox::QStyleOptionComboBox(const QStyleOptionComboBox &other)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a copy of the other style option.

db:section.db:title: QIcon QStyleOptionComboBox::currentIcon
db:section.db:para: This variable holds the icon for the current item of the combo box
The default value is an empty icon, i.e. an icon with neither a pixmap nor a filename.

db:section.db:title: QString QStyleOptionComboBox::currentText
db:section.db:para: This variable holds the text for the current item of the combo box
The default value is an empty string.

db:section.db:title: bool QStyleOptionComboBox::editable
db:section.db:para: This variable holds whether or not the combobox is editable or not
the default value is false

db:section.db:title: bool QStyleOptionComboBox::frame
db:section.db:para: This variable holds whether the combo box has a frame
The default value is true.

db:section.db:title: QSize QStyleOptionComboBox::iconSize
db:section.db:para: This variable holds the icon size for the current item of the combo box
The default value is QSize(-1, -1), i.e. an invalid size.

db:section.db:title: QRect QStyleOptionComboBox::popupRect
db:section.db:para: This variable holds the popup rectangle for the combobox
The default value is a null rectangle, i.e. a rectangle with both the width and the height set to 0.
This variable is currently unused. You can safely ignore it.
